title: r/Relationships My Husband Wants Us To Become a Throuple!
description: r/Relationships_Advice In today's episode, OP finds out that her husband has been cheating on her with her best friend. That's when OP's husband does something very surprising: he suggests thatt they upgrade their couple into a throuple! Should OP stick with her marriage and invite another woman into their throuple, or should she abandon ship? Let me hear your thoughts in the comments! If you like this video, follow me for more daily Reddit content!
